game.name: 疯狂德州
game.genres: 캐주얼, RPG, 시뮬레이션, 무료 플레이, 앞서 해보기
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 마우스 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 수시 저장
game.shortDescription: "Crazy Texas" is a fun and strategic simulation business game that takes you on a journey from a startup novice to a business tycoon.
game.shortDescriptionEn: "Crazy Texas" is a fun and strategic simulation business game that takes you on a journey from a startup novice to a business tycoon.
